title: Luminique ‚Äî Gamified Skincare Self-Care Ecosystem (Full Build)

requirements.summary: Create Zustand-based global state management with four persisted stores
acceptanceCriteria: All four stores are initialized with default data and hydrated from localStorage on app load
State changes persist across page refreshes
GlowPoints update in real-time across all screens when routines are completed

file_operations.description: Create Zustand store for user profile data with fields: name, email, gender, ageRange, skinType, skinConcerns, routinePreference, glowPoints, streak, bestStreak, tier, totalRoutinesCompleted, hasCompletedOnboarding. Include actions to update profile, increment GlowPoints, update streak, and calculate tier. Persist to localStorage using Zustand persist middleware.

Create Zustand store for routine tracking with fields: todayMorningSteps, todayEveningSteps, history, currentStreak, bestStreak. Include actions: completeMorningStep(id), completeEveningStep(id), completeFullRoutine(type). Persist to localStorage using Zustand persist middleware.

Create Zustand store for shop data with fields: products array, cart, wishlist. Include actions: addToCart, removeFromCart, toggleWishlist, checkout. Persist to localStorage using Zustand persist middleware.
Create Zustand store for community data with fields: posts array, leaderboard array. Include actions: likePost(id). Persist to localStorage using Zustand persist middleware.

requirements.summary: Implement React Router navigation with seven routes and conditional onboarding redirect
acceptanceCriteria: Splash screen displays for 2.5 seconds then redirects appropriately
New users are routed to /onboarding; returning users to /home
All 7 routes render their respective screens without errors

file_operations.description: Set up React Router with routes: / (SplashScreen), /onboarding (OnboardingScreen), /home (HomeScreen), /routine (RoutineScreen), /shop (ShopScreen), /community (CommunityScreen), /profile (ProfileScreen). Import all screen components and configure routing.

Create a bottom tab navigation bar component with icons and labels for Home, Routine, Shop, Community, and Profile. Use React Router NavLink for navigation. Apply glass morphism styling and ensure minimum 44px touch targets. Position fixed at bottom with safe area padding.

requirements.summary: Build animated SplashScreen with logo, tagline, and auto-redirect
acceptanceCriteria: Logo animates in with scale and fade on load
Tagline is visible below the logo
Redirects to /onboarding (new user) or /home (returning user) after 2.5s

file_operations.description: Create SplashScreen component at route /. Display animated Luminique lotus logo using the Logo component with scale and fade-in CSS keyframe animations. Show tagline 'Glow. Grow. Bloom.' below logo. Apply beige-to-lavender gradient background. Implement useEffect hook with 2.5s timer that checks userStore.hasCompletedOnboarding and redirects to /home if true, otherwise /onboarding. Use React Router's useNavigate for programmatic navigation.

requirements.summary: Build multi-step OnboardingScreen with eight steps, progress indicator, and data persistence

Selections are visually highlighted with purple on tap

file_operations.description: Create OnboardingScreen component at route /onboarding with eight sequential steps: (1) Welcome with logo and 'Get Started' button; (2) Gender selection cards (Male/Female/Others); (3) Age range cards (13‚Äì19, 20‚Äì29, 30‚Äì39, 40‚Äì49, 50+); (4) Skin type cards with icons (Normal, Oily, Dry, Combination, Sensitive); (5) Multi-select skin concern pills (Acne, Pigmentation, Dullness, Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Uneven Texture, Redness, Large Pores); (6) Routine preference cards (Morning, Evening, Both); (7) Mock AI skin scan with camera frame UI, 'Analyzing...' progress animation, mock result, and skip option; (8) Profile creation form with name, email inputs, 'Continue with Email' button, mock 'Continue with Google' button, and privacy note. acceptanceCriteria: Greeting changes based on time of day

requirements.summary: Create FlowerEngine component with four animated SVG/CSS states
acceptanceCriteria: All four flower states render correctly and are visually distinct
Bud state sways gently using CSS keyframes
Bloom state pulses with a soft glow
Withered state droops with reduced opacity
State transitions animate smoothly without jarring jumps

file_operations.description: Create FlowerEngine component with four SVG/CSS animated states: (1) Seed (0‚Äì2 days): rounded mound shape in earth-brown tones; (2) Bud (3‚Äì6 days): stem with small closed bud in soft green with gentle-sway CSS keyframe animation rotating -2deg to 2deg; (3) Bloom (7+ days): full lotus flower in brand purples/lavenders with pulse-glow keyframe animation scaling 1‚Üí1.05‚Üí1 and glow shadow; (4) Withered (missed after active streak): drooping flower in desaturated tones with droop animation using translateY and opacity reduction. Accept streak prop and calculate state using getFlowerState utility. Apply smooth CSS transitions between state changes.

Create utility function getFlowerState(streak: number, previousStreak: number): 'seed' | 'bud' | 'bloom' | 'withered' that returns flower state based on streak value: 'withered' if streak is 0 and previousStreak > 0, 'seed' for 1‚Äì2 days, 'bud' for 3‚Äì6 days, 'bloom' for 7+ days.

requirements.summary: Implement gamification logic for GlowPoints, tiers, flower states, and animations
acceptanceCriteria: All point awards fire correctly at the right triggers
Tier badge updates automatically when point thresholds are crossed
Flower state changes correctly based on streak value
Floating point text appears and fades on point award
Streak number animates with a roll effect on increment

file_operations.description: Create gamification utility functions: (1) awardGlowPoints(amount: number, reason: string) that increments userStore.glowPoints and triggers floating point animation; (2) calculateTier(points: number): 'Starter' | 'GlowUp' | 'GlowPro' based on thresholds (Starter: 0‚Äì499, GlowUp: 500‚Äì1499, GlowPro: 1500+); (3) getPointsForAction(action: string): number returning point values (+10 morning routine, +10 evening routine, +5 bonus both same day, +50 bonus 7-day streak, +15 review, +25 first purchase); (4) checkAchievementUnlock(user) that evaluates achievement conditions and returns newly unlocked achievements.

Create FloatingPointsText component that displays '+X' text with CSS keyframe animation floating upward and fading out over 1.5 seconds. Accept points amount as prop. Position absolutely near GlowPointsBadge when triggered.

Create StreakCounter component displaying streak number with fire emoji and 'Day streak' label. Implement number-roll animation on increment using CSS transform and transition. Accept streak value as prop from routineStore.

requirements.summary: Implement global UI effects: confetti, chime, and toast notifications
acceptanceCriteria: Confetti triggers and plays correctly on routine completion
Chime plays on routine completion without errors (handles AudioContext user gesture requirement)
Toast notifications slide in from top and auto-dismiss after ~3 seconds
Toast messages use the correct contextual text

file_operations.description: Create Confetti component using CSS particle animation with 20‚Äì30 particles in lavender, pink, mint green, and gold colors falling from top over 1.5 seconds. Use CSS keyframes for particle animation with random delays and horizontal drift. Accept trigger prop to control when animation plays. Render particles absolutely positioned across viewport width.

Create playChime utility function using Web Audio API. Generate 880Hz sine wave oscillator with 0.8s exponential decay envelope. Handle AudioContext user gesture requirement by creating context on first user interaction. Export playChime function for use on routine completion.

Create Toast notification component with slide-in-from-top animation. Accept message and duration props. Auto-dismiss after duration (default 3 seconds). Apply glass morphism card styling. Support contextual messages: 'üå∏ Time for your morning routine!', 'üî• Don't break your X-day streak!', 'üíß Your flower needs water ‚Äî log today's routine', '‚ú® New personalized products just for you', 'üèÜ You're close to GlowPro tier!'.

Create useToast hook for managing toast notification queue. Return showToast function that adds toast to queue with message and optional duration. Handle rendering multiple toasts with stacking positions. Export hook for use across screens.

requirements.summary: Apply Luminique design system consistently across all screens

acceptanceCriteria: Recommended products match the user's skin type or concerns

file_operations.description: Create getRecommendations(user) utility function that: (1) Filters products array by matching user.skinType in product.skinTypes OR user.skinConcerns overlapping with product.concerns; (2) Sorts filtered results by rating descending; (3) Returns top 6 products.
